title: On extensions of Frobenius-K\"ahler and Sasakian Lie algebras
authors: M.C. ROdr\'iguez-Vallarte, G. Salgado, O.A. S\'anchez-Valenzuela
abstract:
Extensions of Lie algebras equipped with Sasakian or Frobenius-K\"ahler
geometrical structures are studied. Conditions are given so that a double
extension of a Sasakian Lie algebra be Sasakian again. Conditions are also
given for obtaining either a Sasakian or a Frobernius-K\"ahler Lie algebra upon
respectively extending a Frobernius-K\"ahler or a Sasakian Lie algebra by
adjoining a derivation of the source algebra. Low-dimensional examples are
included.
